TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {288735=As of April 2015[update], there are fifteen former members of the U.S. House of Representatives from the U.S. State of Virginia who are currently living at this time.}
textBeforeTable: As of April 2015[update], there are fifteen former members of the U.S. House of Representatives from the U.S. State of Virginia who are currently living at this time. Living former Members of the U.S. House of Representatives from Virginia[edit] Election invalidated March 4, 1899 – March 12, 1900 Election invalidated March 4, 1897 – April 26, 1898 2nd Democratic (1860–1928) William A. Woods Resigned January 3, 1935 – December 31, 1945 6th March 4, 1933 – January 3, 1935 AL
